title: Winter Gardening
description: Winter is a time of rest and planning in the garden. Use this quieter season to reflect on last year's garden, plan for spring, and care for indoor plants while connecting with nature's cycle of dormancy and renewal.

free_tips.title: Plan next year's garden
free_tips.description: Sketch layouts and order seeds for spring. Take time to visualize and set intentions for your upcoming garden.

free_tips.title: Care for tools
free_tips.description: Clean, sharpen, and oil garden tools. Practice gratitude for these instruments that help you connect with your garden.

free_tips.title: Monitor indoor plants
free_tips.description: Adjust watering and light for houseplants during winter. Notice how their needs change with the season.

free_tips.title: Observe winter wildlife
free_tips.description: Take time to notice birds and other creatures that visit your garden in winter. Consider leaving some seed heads for them.

premium_tips.title: Winter Pruning Guide
premium_tips.description: Learn the art of dormant pruning for different trees and shrubs, with mindfulness practices to connect with woody plants in their resting state.

premium_tips.title: Indoor Garden Projects
premium_tips.description: Create beautiful and functional indoor growing spaces with mindful design principles and meditation practices.

premium_tips.title: Seed Starting Timeline
premium_tips.description: Detailed calendar for starting seeds indoors during late winter, with mindfulness practices for each stage of seedling development.

premium_tips.title: Winter Soil Improvement
premium_tips.description: Learn about techniques such as sheet mulching and winter cover crops, connecting with the living soil even in its dormant season.

premium_tips.title: Garden Reflection Practices
premium_tips.description: Guided exercises to evaluate last year's garden and set meaningful intentions for the coming growing season.

premium_tips.title: Winter Plant Identification
premium_tips.description: Learn to identify trees and shrubs by their winter features, developing a deeper relationship with plants in all their forms.

premium_tips.title: Garden Journaling Guide
premium_tips.description: Create a meaningful record of your garden through various journaling techniques, connecting more deeply with your garden journey.
